attributes.action: Leave now as the public has no confidence in you.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the state of the UK because of  governments actions, Parliament should be dissolved now. The majority of the people have no faith in the Labour goverment and want them to go now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
